attributes.additional_details:
We are a free country and have the right to freedom of speech, so they say. 

But what's wrong is people being turned down of a job, getting sacked and discriminated because of there "free country" of will be have art placed on there skin. We as humans should have every right to portray ourselves on how we want and not how others want us to be.
attributes.background: Don't let a workplace discriminate a human on there characteristics.
